metadata.name: Assess GenAI Initiative Idea
metadata.shortDescription: Conduct comprehensive assessment of GenAI solution requests through structured questionnaire and research
metadata.description: This skill evaluates GenAI initiative ideas through a structured assessment process, combining questionnaire-based discovery with research-backed analysis to determine feasibility, value, and implementation strategy.
objectives: Evaluate GenAI use cases through structured questionnaires
Provide actionable recommendations for GenAI initiatives
Identify risks and opportunities in GenAI adoption
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Validated primarily with Windsurf using GPT Low Reasoning and GitHub Sonnet 4.x

prompts.name: assess-genai-initiative-idea
prompts.description: Main assessment workflow for GenAI initiative evaluation
